import { createGlobalStyle } from 'styled-components';
export default createGlobalStyle(["*{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box;}body{background:", ";color:", ";font:400 16px Roboto,sans-serif;}@keyframes backgroundAnimation{0%{background-color:#ff0000;}50%{background-color:#e60000;}100%{background-color:#ff0000;}}.background-animation{animation:backgroundAnimation 5s linear infinite;}"], props => props.theme.colors.background, props => props.theme.colors.text);
